hef.IRCTransport
Class Connect

java.lang.Object
  hef.IRCTransport.Connect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Connect
extends Object
implements Runnable

Connection Task This class us a Runnable class for connecting to the irc server. It will reschedule a connection

Field Summary
static int INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY
          Amount of time to wait to reconnect if a connection was already established, but was then lost.
static int RETRY_RATE
          Time between connection retries after a failed connection attempt.
 
Constructor Summary
Connect(IrcAgent parent)
          Create a Connection instance Pass this from IrcAgent so we have access.
 
Method Summary
 void run()
          Run the connection task This task will schedule another connection task if it fails to connect.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

RETRY_RATE

public static final int RETRY_RATE
Time between connection retries after a failed connection attempt. 4oo is 20 seconds.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY

public static final int INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY
Amount of time to wait to reconnect if a connection was already established, but was then lost. 100 is 5 seconds
